column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the pulled pork with fries and cornbread and I split the St Louis ribs taste with my girlfriend.  I think we could have split the pork platter as well and just bought an extra bun.  The pulled pork wasn't very warm and a little more fatty than I would have liked - I think they might have been scraping the bottom of the barrel.  The ribs were fantastic and I would love to try a half slab of each next time.  The sides were all great
column2: especially the Jiffy cornbread that reminded me of eating BBQ chicken at my grandparent's.  My girlfriend picked up the mac and cheese and loved it.  I really wanted to try the peach cobbler but I probably would have exploded.
